title: Parmesan Rice with Peppers and Spinach
ingredients: ['200g easy cook rice', '475ml water', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large orange pepper, finely chopped', '1/2 red pepper, finely chopped', '1/2 yellow pepper, finely chopped', '30g chopped onion', '60g baby spinach leaves', '1 teaspoon garlic salt', '1 tablespoon savoury salt', '230ml vinaigrette salad dressing, to taste', '50g grated Parmesan cheese']
